CollectionVersion.$comment: This field is only updated when a breaking changes to the manifest format are made and will be done with schema updates.
CollectionVersion.description: The major collection version of this collection. Used for identifying compatibility with other tools.

Description.description: A short description describing this shaderpack.

Authors.description: A short description describing this shaderpack.

Images.description: A collection of images that show off this shaderpack in action. Must be a https URL ending with .png or a .jpg.

WebsiteURL.description: A URL to the website of this shaderpack. This could be a git repository or landing page.

DonationURL.description: A URL to a website where someone can donate to this shaderpack.

ShaderCount.description: The amount of shaders include in this pack.

TextureCount.description: The amount of textures included in this shaderpack.

PresetCount.description: The amount of presets included in this shaderpack.

AddonCount.description: The amount of addons included in this shaderpack.
